alert.note: Alert for Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:33PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Marinette County through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just northwest of Marinette, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marinette around 440 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
